item.description:
Come and see Boston's brightest young acting, writing and directing talent at this festival of 3 short plays...I'm excited to see this as my son's lovely girlfriend has a role in Envia!! 

bostonactorstheater.com  

 

Reproduction  by Elizabeth DuPre

Directed by James Aitcheson
One graduate science student asks another for a favor leading to a heated debate about the nature of life. Hilarity ensues in "Reproduction."
 Karen: Danielle Hecht           Ron: Stewart Evan Smith


The Portal of God  by Chatherine Durickas

Directed by: Emilia Allen
The Portal of God examines relationships and the parts of ourselves we lose within them, and the parts we never can get back.
Emily: Poormina Kirby                Sean: Rahul Parikh
Grace: Nicole Howard                 Molly: Rachel Byrd
Gabriella: Liz Martins


Evia! Gifts for the Goddess of Illusion  by Kelly DuMar
Directed by Jeremy Goodman
In this episodic comedy, an aspiring actor seeks answers from the Persian Goddess of Illusion for her problem with the sin of Envy. Conjuring humor, improvisation, and theatrical magic, ENVIA! exposes the twists and tricks of her creative faith that lead to the opportunity of a lifetime
Envia Ensemble:            Kourtenaye Monroe             Lee David Skunes

Carly Kastel                Sarah E. Cote
item.how_to_find_us: Either in the lobby or at a restaurant before the show TBD!
item.name: Boston Actors' Theater Summer Play Festival
